comments.author: BTCWBitcoinWhite
comments.body: Yes we do, we will be updating and posting here and on the information distribution channels. There are people making their own, whoever wants it, in a few weeks we will post it, we were checking the code safely so as not to cause problems for anyone, to avoid bags.

comments.author: Hamitoglu
comments.body: Hello, is it possible to mine with video cards? How does the wallet work? How and when can we start mining it? Please make a discord channel for communication, thanks.

comments.body: It is already possible to mine, just download the wallet and it starts mining automatically.https://github.com/BitcoinWhiteBTCW/BitcoinWhite/blob/Bitcoin-White-BTCW/bitcoinwhite-auto.zip

comments.author: PcChip
comments.body: the github link just has two zip files, one with precompiled EXEs and one with a powershell script that downloads a zip file of other precompiled EXEs    you know that looks shady right? (even if it's not)    Where is your source code so people can audit it and build it themselves?

comments.body: Has anyone already run the miner? can you guide me？

comments.author: BTCWBitcoinWhite
comments.body: As there are only 1,000,000 (one million coins) the difficulty increases faster, and the supply of coins.Guys we use it on our personal machines, there's nothing obscure. Nothing malicious.If you have any bag or error, we will correct it, the most is an error that you may have but nothing malicious.

comments.author: thikachhey
comments.body: The cli file does not work. Is there anything to type in qt wallet console to mine?

comments.author: wanganxiu
comments.body: Create a file at the end of CMD and put it in the wallet program folder. Open the wallet startup file to extract the following commands@echo offset SCRIPT_PATH=%cd%cd %SCRIPT_PATH%echo Press [CTRL+C] to stop mining.:begin for /f %%i in ('bitcoinwhite-cli.exe getnewaddress') do set WALLET_ADDRESS=%%i bitcoinwhite-cli.exe generatetoaddress 30 %WALLET_ADDRESS%goto begin
